page.title: 11CHILDRENS' GAMES 1985
page.content: {"IT", "TAG", or "HE". A running game. This is a game for 3 or more children. The child playing{"IT",}must touch or catch another. When the other is caught he or she takes over the role of{"IT",}and the game continues. {"STICK IN THE MUD". A running game. This is similiar to{"IT",}except when the child is caught he or she must stay still until freed by another player by touching. They can then join in again {"BUDGE". Arunning game. { }This is a game similiar to{"IT", with safe areas or bases for sanctuary Only one player is allowed on any of the defined safe areas at any one time If any player wishes to rest on an already occupied base, they can push the 1st player off with a call of "BUDGE" (or move)
